channel.title: ok so I messed up....
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ok so I messed up...."

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: If you're a kage with over nine thousand monster items, you can replace Emo 3 with Stalkergirl. Otherwise, you have to use Emo 3. You'll definitely need his range bonus.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: Unless you're a Kage in a really good village, nothing can replace Emo3. Emo3 gives +4 strength, +3 range by himself.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: is there someone else to replace emo3? or is he really the only one that will make much of a diffrence

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: Emo3+Panda+Timmy2 is the best team. If that's really not an option, you're going to have a hard time, but try RSB I guess.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded:
One last question when I go for the top 3 would it be better to use Ro-sham-bo because of the +1(Doing it in the bear village) so ill get +2 stamina after every mission like in the CLT. So if I did that I'd get more XP so it would be better to use Ro-Sham-bo for xp farming right? or what is the best team for xp I know timmy and mr smith but Im not sure if I can do A ranks with them. Would B ranks get me much with timmy, mr smith, and probably pinky since shes my valintine.

EDIT- replace all the Mr smiths with PandaBears

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: 6 strength is usually better than 5 levels. Usually.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: So you guys would say Ro-sham-bo isnt better? 6 strength is better them 5 levels? or is it because the 20% or what else?

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: Gives you more dice to roll. Right now, I roll over 30 dice per challenge :P

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: I never really noticed what does more levels do?

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: It depends how much strength you have. If you have +2-4 strength after bankai, bankai is better, I believe.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: I got another question whats better for A ranks bankai or shikai?

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded: Demon Inside is what I did, that's just Billy 3, with no one else.

item.title: Re: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded:
Demon inside
Range is a lot harder to get than strength

item.title: ok so I messed up....
item.content:encoded:
Ok so I leveled up billy lvl 2 to lvl 3 and now I have Billy lvl3, Stalker lvl 2, and pinky lvl 2 and a emosuke lvl 1â€¦. for doing A rank missions I can barly complete roughly half the missions with jutsu. so then the bonuses I am getting is-

+20% auto-win
+5 stength
+2 stamina
+2 tai strength
-15% chakra cost

So would it be better jst to go with the Ro-Sham-Bo Redux?
+5 all levels
+1 stamina
+2 range
+2 strength

Or just let him go alone with the Demon inside
20% auto-win
+6 strength
+2 range
I think

what do you think?
